rows.label: tev030601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Staccata about his work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Staccata if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0001
rows.name:
I perform corporeal maintenance on on the Ma-non.
In layman's terms, I'm basically a doctor?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0002
rows.name: Did you come here for a checkup?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0003
rows.name:
I don't have any experience with mechanical bodies like
yours, you understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0004
rows.name:
If you are feeling under the weather, perhaps you
should seek out a mechanic instead?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0012
rows.name:
Lately, I've had a surge in patients complaining about
stomach pains, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0013
rows.name:
Well, even after numerous rigorous examinations,
I don't think I'm any closer to pinpointing the cause?
However...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0014
rows.name:
Many of my patients claim to have been cured by
something called the Bringer of Miracles?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0017
rows.name:
So in the interest of medical research, I took it upon
myself to visit this Mr. Bringer—and you know what?
It it it turns out he's not human![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0018
rows.name:
They really believe some invisible being cured them?
...Perhaps more than stomachs ail them, am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Staccata about Ma-non life cycles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Staccata about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Staccata about mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0019
rows.name:
We Ma-non live a great number of years,
but we produce very few children, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0020
rows.name:
Surely you've noted their absence from our ship?
That's because they're being cared for and and
protected on our homeworld...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0021
rows.name:
Of course, if we fail to find a way to escape the
confines of Mira, we'll have to more seriously consider
extending our species here, you understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0022
rows.name:
But we would just as soon wait until the Ganglion
threat has passed, I imagine? That's one advantage of
living long lives—we're never in a rush...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0028
rows.name: When Fraisie left, I saw several Ma-non go with her...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0031
rows.name:
I know the fiend has been declawed, but it it still
doesn't sit right with me, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0032
rows.name:
Once I'm done treating the Ma-non she inflicted that
poison of hers on, maybe I'll try to track them down?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG0033
rows.name:
And if I find anything unsavory is going on, I hope you
will be there to to help me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG2010
rows.name:
It seems Fraisie believed the Bringer of Miracles would
come to her rescue until the very end, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG2011
rows.name:
It should have been plain as day that the xenoform was
tricking her, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG2012
rows.name:
The villain might even be hiding among us as we
speak, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG2013
rows.name:
And and and who knows what form it's taken?
We must take care not to miss even the tiniest detail![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG2018
rows.name: Are you still in your mechanical body?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG2019
rows.name:
Since you'd gone to the Lifehold Core, I just assumed
you would return with your real body, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030601_MSG2020
rows.name:
There go my hopes of carefully dissecting every last
limb and lymph node you possess, I suppose?
Er, figuratively speaking, of course...[ST:wait ]
